summary: Completed testing for OMNISupply.io iteration 9. All 11 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified: Category dropdown shows icons, Brand dropdown shows color dots, Product comparison feature fully functional (add/remove/clear/max 4 limit), Submit RFQ button is orange (#FF9900) with helper text, Watch Demo modal works, Login page shows Admin credentials section.
passed_tests: Brands list includes Donaldson, Avantor, Markem-Imaje
Categories list includes IT Equipment, Safety & PPE, Filtration
Search for Donaldson products returns results
Search for Avantor products returns results
Search for Markem-Imaje products returns results

category_icons_dropdown.details: Category dropdown shows icons next to each category name (Cog for Bearings, Lightbulb for Electrical, Wrench for Fasteners, etc.)

brand_color_dots.details: Brand dropdown shows colored dots next to brand names

compare_button_on_cards.details: Purple GitCompare icon button appears on each product card (top-left corner)

compare_toast_notification.details: Clicking compare button shows toast notification with product name

compare_button_filter_bar.details: Compare (N) button appears in filter bar when products are selected

comparison_modal.details: Modal shows side-by-side table with Brand, Price, Rating, Availability, Lead Time, Category, UNSPSC, SKU, and specifications

remove_from_comparison.details: X button on each product in modal removes it from comparison

add_to_cart_from_modal.details: Add to Cart button in comparison modal works, shows 'Added to cart!' toast

clear_all_comparison.details: Clear All button removes all products and closes modal

max_4_products_limit.details: Shows error toast 'Maximum 4 products can be compared' when trying to add 5th product

watch_demo_button.details: Watch Demo button on landing page opens demo walkthrough modal with slides

login_admin_credentials.details: Login page shows Admin Portal Access section with admin@omnisupply.io / admin123 credentials

submit_rfq_button.details: Orange (#FF9900) button with 'Can't find a product or service?' helper text

new_vendor_products.details: Donaldson, Avantor, Markem-Imaje products are searchable via API

critical_code_review_comments: CATEGORY_ICONS mapping correctly implemented with 30+ category-to-icon mappings
Compare feature uses React state (compareList) with proper add/remove/clear functions
Max 4 products limit enforced with toast error message
Comparison modal displays comprehensive product data including specifications
Brand dropdown shows color dots via brand.color property
Submit RFQ button correctly styled with bg-[#FF9900] class
seed_data_creation: None - used existing demo account and catalog products

mocked_apis.note: These features are placeholders as mentioned in review request

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 9 fully tested. All new features working: Category icons in dropdown, Brand color dots, Product comparison (up to 4 products with side-by-side table), Watch Demo modal, Admin credentials on login page, Orange Submit RFQ button with helper text. New vendor products (Donaldson, Avantor, Markem-Imaje) searchable. Use demo@infosys.com/demo123/USA for testing. Compare feature test IDs: compare-toggle-{product.id}, compare-btn, compare-modal.
